漏電: (ろうでん) - short circuit; leakage (of electricity); electrical fault

演し物: (だしもの) - program (e.g. theatre, theater)/programme; (theatrical) piece/number/performance/feature
演じる: (えんじる) - to perform (a play); to play (a part); to act (a part); to commit (a blunder)
演ずる: (えんずる) - to perform; to play
演る: (やる) - (often used in the popular music industry)  to perform; to play; to act
演劇づく: (えんげきづく) - to be absorbed in a play
演劇付く: (えんげきづく) - to be absorbed in a play

演技派: (えんぎは) - (actor) relying on acting skills (rather than good looks, etc.)
演曲: (えんきょく) - musical program; musical programme
演歌: (えんか) - enka/traditional-style Japanese popular ballad; (艶歌 only) troubadour

演武: (えんぶ) - martial arts demonstration; martial arts training

演目: (えんもく) - program (musical, concert, theatrical, etc.); programme

演算制御装置: (えんざんせいぎょそうち) - arithmetic and control unit; ACU
演算器: (えんざんき) - functional unit (e.g. in analog computing)
演算増幅器: (えんざんぞうふくき) - operational amplifier
演算方式: (えんざんほうしき) - arithmetic equation
演算機: (えんざんき) - processor (as in computer chip)
演算記号省略: (えんざんきごうしょうりゃく) - asyndetic
演算論理装置: (えんざんろんりそうち) - arithmetic and logic unit; ALU
演繹的説明法: (えんえきてきせつめいほう) - deductive method

演能: (えんのう) - performance of a noh play; performing a noh play

漕ぎつける: (こぎつける) - to row (a boat) up to (a pier); to attain/to reach (a certain stage)/to manage to do
漕ぎ寄せる: (こぎよせる) - to row up to (e.g. a ship)
漕ぎ着ける: (こぎつける) - to row (a boat) up to (a pier); to attain/to reach (a certain stage)/to manage to do
